name: The North Face Resolve Reflective Jacket - Girls' - Youths
description: Umbrellas a great for staying dry in the rain, but not really practical for kids that are always on the move. The Resolve Reflective rain jacket provides on-the-go, umbrella-like protection for kids that don’t slow down. The 2-layer waterproof breathable fabric and fully taped seams keep your little one dry even on the wettest days.2-layer waterproof breathable with DryVent™ technology and fully taped seams will keep you little one dry.Smooth nylon lining in the sleeves and hood slides easily over layers.Polyester mesh lining in the body helps with airflow.Zippered hand pockets protect small hands and keep tiny treasures safe.Front zipper has a storm flap that secures with Velcro®, keeping the warm in and the wet out.Reflective logo on the front and back help keep the smaller set seen when the light gets low.Internal ID label takes some of the confusion out of school pick-ups.Elasticised cuffs seal out the bad weather.
